entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Newmarket
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:52 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: King City North 03:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Temperature: -0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -4.3°C
Wind: ESE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 6:05 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of freezing rain or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to periods of rain near noon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 6:05 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers and drizzle. Fog patches developing near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 6:05 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
